PolicyInfo.Text: NCL Consumer Advice: FOR EMBARKATION/RE-ENTRY INTO THE US: US/CANADIANMUST CARRY DOCUMENTARY PROOF OF CITIZENSHIP. REQUIREMENTS VARY BYAND GUESTS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR VERIFYING THEIR REQUIREMENTS. OTHERMUST CARRY VALID PASSPORTS AND VERIFY THEIR VISA REQUIREMENTS WITHFOR EACH DESTINATION. GUESTS WITHOUT PROPER DOCUMENTATION WILL NOT BETO BOARD. TERMS AND CONDITIONS ARE IN THE NCL BROCHURES AND ARE ALSOAT http://www.ncl.com
